hero.title: Secure and Convenient
hero.description: Kaitu.io provides professional-grade network proxy services with multi-platform client support, utilising advanced encryption technology to ensure your network connection is secure, fast, and stable.

security.title: Kaitu Protocol - Next-Generation Network Transmission
security.description: The Kaitu Protocol is our proprietary next-generation network transmission protocol, utilising advanced technologies including multipath aggregation, military-grade encryption, and intelligent routing to provide you with a secure, fast, and stable network connection experience.

caTech.title: Multipath Aggregation Technology (MPTCP)
caTech.description: Kaitu Protocol's innovative multipath aggregation technology enables simultaneous data transmission through multiple network channels, achieving bandwidth aggregation and intelligent load balancing. Even if a single link fails, seamless switching ensures uninterrupted connectivity.

advantages.title: Core Features
advantages.item1: Multi-channel transmission with intelligent bandwidth aggregation
advantages.item2: Real-time RTT measurement, automatic optimal path selection
advantages.item4: Exponential moving average algorithm for precise path evaluation

adaptive.title: Enterprise-Grade Network Adaptation
adaptive.item1: Intelligent protocol selection based on network conditions
adaptive.item2: Support for WebSocket, HTTP/2, and multiple transport methods
adaptive.item3: Real-time network quality monitoring and optimisation
adaptive.item4: Reliable connectivity in poor network environments

multipath.title: Multipath Aggregation
multipath.description: Simultaneous utilisation of multiple network channels, intelligent optimal path selection, bandwidth aggregation, and automatic failover

encryption.title: Military-Grade Encryption
encryption.description: AES-256-GCM encryption algorithm, ECDSA P-256 elliptic curve, PBKDF2 with 100,000 iterations for key derivation

smartRouting.title: Intelligent Routing
smartRouting.description: RTT-based real-time path optimisation, exponential moving average algorithm ensures the fastest channel is always used

disguise.title: Traffic Obfuscation
disguise.description: CA certificate simulation technology, traffic appears as standard HTTPS, perfectly blending into normal network environments

failover.title: Automatic Failover
failover.description: Millisecond-level switching when a single path fails, completely transparent to users, ensuring business continuity

performance.title: High-Performance Architecture
performance.description: Support for 5,000 concurrent connections, 32KB buffer pool optimisation, zero-copy data forwarding

kaitu.name: Kaitu
kaitu.tech: MPTCP multipath aggregation + CA certificate obfuscation

visualization.title: Multipath Aggregation Technology (MPTCP)
visualization.subtitle: Real-time demonstration: Data transmitted simultaneously through multiple relay nodes with intelligent optimal path selection
visualization.description: The diagram above illustrates the Kaitu Protocol's multipath aggregation architecture: Data departs from the client and is transmitted simultaneously through multiple geographically distributed relay nodes to the target server. The system monitors each node's latency (RTT) in real-time, automatically allocating more traffic to the optimal node (green dashed box). When a node fails, traffic switches instantly to other available nodes, ensuring uninterrupted connectivity. Each relay node can also be configured with multiple network interfaces for further bandwidth aggregation.
